Instance.description: The Sim performs a crafting interaction that transfers the crafting process to a specified participant.

TunableEnum.name: crafting_component_recipient
TunableEnum.description: The participant of this interaction to which the Crafting process is transferred.

Tunable.name: override_crafting_process
Tunable.description: If set to True, when crafting component is added to object, set the crafting process even if the object already had a crafting component.
